version_description:
- Added support for PDF documents
- Support for links, audio , video embedded in PDF
- Added ability to take Voice Note on a highlight
- Support for Epub 3 Table of contents
- Added ability to change font size , fonts and contrast
- Bug fixes

• Fix bug where audio file embedded in epub was not playing
• Minor bug fixes

Multi-Level Hierarchy for Teacher & Student Resources.
Remember the state of multi level hierarchy
Search and Filtering options for the resources
Added a "Go-To" Page resource.
Resources is supported for both epub and pdf
TOC - 2nd level collapse and remember state.
Multi color highlights
Introducing the brand new app icon for R+
Addresses the crash issue while opening PDF on iOS 11

* Bug Fixes
* Updated resource icon with page level resource awareness
* Suppress button(s) for non-existent resource types

Updated Italian Translations
Minor Bug Fix -
Fix for Login issue for usernames with space
Added support for Media Overlay Epubs

Enhanced Iframe Styling
Added support for subscript and superscript characters in the TOC and Resources Panel

Improved resolution when using zoom with PDF content.
Minor usability improvement. Added the ability to expand/collapse a header level Resource item by clicking anywhere on the row.

Users will now have the ability to download resources so that they can be available for offline use.
Miscellaneous minor bug fixes.
Miscellaneous minor bug fixes and memory optimization.
Miscellaneous minor bug fixes.

· Highlight the current word with clippers in a PDF page.
· Miscellaneous minor bug fixes.

· Read to me enhanced Media Overlay
· More button in Action bar
· Enable Redeem Code for Mobile
· Miscellaneous minor bug fixes.

· Book update notifications
· Capturing School ID in Google Analytics events
· Miscellaneous minor bug fixes.

- Google Analytics - Improve accuracy of session length and Event Attributes parity checking across streams
- Miscellaneous minor bug fixes.

- Filter icons on Resource search page based on what is available in title.
- Ellipsis To Truncated Titles On Bookshelf.
- Miscellaneous minor bug fixes.

- Resource download manager updates
- Animated download icon updates
- Miscellaneous minor bug fixes.

- Updated Interface - including multiple usability and accessibility improvements
- Faster - content rendering, page turning and load times
- Bug fixes - multiple bug fixes
Bug fixes - multiple bug fixes

Updated Interface - including multiple usability and accessibility improvements.
Faster - content rendering, page navigation and load times.
Bug fixes - multiple bug fixes.
